dailyQuestions.question: Show that by adding one to the product of four consecutive integers, a perfect square is obtained.
If a and b are real numbers such that a+b=1 and a^2+b^2=3, find the value of a^5+b^5

The radius of a cylinder is increasing at a rate of 1 meter per hour, and the height of the cylinder is decreasing at a rate of 4 meters per hour. At a certain instant, the base radius is 5 meters and the height is 8 meters. What is the rate of change of the volume of the cylinder at the instant?
Suppose that the minute hand of a clock is 15 mm long and the hour hand is 12 mm. How fast is the distance between the hour hand and the minute hand changing at 2 pm?

questions.question: What is the limit of (1+1/x)^x as x approches infinity?
Prove the derivative of sin(x)
What is the limit as x approches inifity of sqrt(x^3 - 1)/x^2?
Prove Euler's Identity
find the indefinite integral of sec(x) with respect to x
find the indefinite integral of e^x log x
Evaluate the integral (t^3-1)/ln(t) dt from 0 to 1

There is an initial population of 300,000 people, and 4,600 of those people are infected with a curable disease. Every year, exactly at the same time for everyone, the cure takes effect, but it only works 12% of the time. Furthermore, 8% of those who are healthy will become sick and 2% of the population will give birth (let us assume there is no age or sex) – the birth will occur just before the other actions, so if someone is born they could become sick immediately after. Will there be a time at which the ratio of healthy people to sick people remains constant, if so, what is this ratio?
What is i to the power of i, where i is the imaginary number sqrt(-1)?
Prove that sqrt(3) is irrational
Find and prove the equation for the sum of the first n integers?
Evaluate the following limit: $\lim_{x \to \infty} (x+\frac{1}{x})^x$?
What is the integral of (x^3)(sinx)
Solve the following infinite series
questions.solution: X is equal to the golden ration. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QAMXSU40ZgA

questions.question: Solve this definite integral. The first 10 digits is the wifi password ;)
Solve this indefinite integral:
Show that if z = r cis theta - r > 0 - then the distance between z and z-bar in the complex plane is 2r abs(sin theta).

A bomb explodes sending three pieces of shrapnel into three directions. One piece of mass m travels horizontally to the left with a speed of 15m/s, while the other piece has another mass of m traveling downwards at a speed of 8m/s, find the direction and speed of the third piece if it has a mass of 3m.
If e^y = sin(x) for 0 < x < pi, find dy/dx.
Evaluate e^(i pi / 6) where i is the square root of -1.

A boat travels at 20km/hr 030T while a submarine travels at 32km/hr 187T. The submarine has a radar that can detect anything that is 5km away from it. If the sub starts at the postion (10, 4) and the boat starts at the position (1, -3) (coordinates represent the distance in km from some arbitary origin), determine if the sub will detect the boat - if so, at what time.

A car is approaching a bend which is of radius 40 m. The coefficient of friction between the road and the car's tyres is 0.4. Find the maximum speed at which the car can turn the bend without skidding
How many complex numbers z satisfy the relations |z-1|=1 and |z|=|z-i| simulaneously?
Express 1+i(sqrt(3)) in polar form
Solve for all roots of the following polynomial by hand
